ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.fragment

Interface BowlerFragment.OnBowlerSelectedListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    BowlerFragment

    public static interface BowlerFragment.OnBowlerSelectedListener
    Container Activity must implement this interface to allow LeagueEventFragment to be loaded when a bowler is selected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBowlerSelected(long bowlerId, java.lang.String bowlerName, boolean openLeagueFragment, boolean isQuickSeries)
      Should be overridden to create a LeagueEventFragment with the leagues belonging to the bowler represented by bowlerId.

    • Method Detail

      • onBowlerSelected

        void onBowlerSelected(long bowlerId,
                      java.lang.String bowlerName,
                      boolean openLeagueFragment,
                      boolean isQuickSeries)
        Should be overridden to create a LeagueEventFragment with the leagues belonging to the bowler represented by bowlerId.
        Parameters:
        bowlerId - id of the bowler whose leagues/events will be displayed
        bowlerName - name of the bowler corresponding to bowlerId
        openLeagueFragment - if new fragment should be opened
        isQuickSeries - if a quick series is being created
